Name: Elderflower Cosmo
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Despite the absence of citrus vodka, orange liqueur and cranberry, this delicate blend is still Cosmopolitan-esque in style.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. Recipes and origin of the Cosmopolitan cocktail
Nutrition: One serving of Elderflower Cosmo contains 184 calories
